entry.title: 3M F-3400-TAN-27 - 3M Burnish Pad, 3400, tan, 686 mm (27 in) F-3400-TAN-27 7000126174
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 99.56

[shortdesc]

3M Burnish Pad, 3400, tan, 686 mm (27 in)

  • 3M™ Tan Burnish Pad 3400 is a floor maintenance burnishing pad that produces a brilliant gloss while removing scuffs and marks and is the industry standard for consistent performance and long life
  • Made of polyester fibre in a non-woven web construction, this pad offers exceptional durability and life
  • The fibres are bonded to the web structure with a durable resin system that permeates the entire pad.Its durable construction make these pads ideal for use on harder finishes and high traffic conditions.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Produces brilliant wet-look in gloss
  • Designed for exceptional durability, life and superior mark removal
    		•
